overview: A couple meets a TV actress with her boyfriend on the highway, as their car was broken down. They offered them a lift as they were staying in the same hotel. The wife was a big fan of the TV actress. After reaching the hotel, the couple enjoyed in their room, as they have come on a vacation after long time. The husband got up in the night and came outside to smoke a cigarette, suddenly he heard some noise from the TV actresses room.
title: Girgiti
